name: menuHasKeyEquivalent(_:for:target:action:)
desc: Invoked to allow the delegate to return the target and action for a key-down event.
declaration:
optional func menuHasKeyEquivalent(_ menu: NSMenu, 
                               for event: NSEvent, 
                            target: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<AnyObject?>, 
                            action: UnsafeMutablePointer<Selector?>) -> Bool
